Class AbstractResourceHandler

java.lang.Object
  net.jawr.web.resource.AbstractResourceHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileSystemResourceHandler, ServletContextResourceHandler
public abstract class AbstractResourceHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceHandler

Abstract resourcehandler implementation with common functionality. Copyright 2007 Jordi Hernández Sellés
